did.label: Identity DID
did.hint: Enter decentralized ID of one of your identities, the auth request will come to your external wallet

error.minLength: DID can't be shorter than 10 symbols

pin.label: Auth PIN code
pin.hint: Enter PIN code into your wallet to confirm authentication

pin.label: PIN Code
pin.hint: Type PIN code from the page that requests authentication here

error.minLength: PIN can't be shorter than 4 symbols
